title: Can't see draven landing emblems
body: for me there is no emblem for when a draven axe is in the air and i have to catch it. I can only see what an enemy player would see, the spinning circle. So somebody help please

replies.body: Try repairing your client, sounds like you're missing some files.
I had the same issue and tried repairing the client, but it didn't work.

Sometimes a reinstall through hextech repair tool will fix what a basic repair doesn't. I had an issue with sound files that suffered the same.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool
I tried reinstalling using the hrt but it still didn't work.

I'd recommend submitting a support ticket then, they should be able to help you more.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
